FragmentofAuric.name: Fragment of Auric
FragmentofAuric.desc:
Pieces of the power that once was.

- Gain 99 Max HP
- Gain 25 Base Offense Level
- Gain 35 Base Defense Level
- Lock this Unit's speed to 20 at Turn Start (WIP)
- Gain 12 Aggro at Turn Start
- At Combat Start, Gain 146 HP Shield for every enemy targeting this unit
- Heal 1~3 HP On Hit
